data.title: Leca Quarry, Solignano, Parma Province, Emilia
data.meta_description:
Leca Quarry, Solignano, Parma Province, Emilia-Romagna, Italy : Clay quarry near Rubbiano.

Septarian concretions, radiating baryte nodules, pyrite and marcasite aggregates are found along the quarry faces in the rills due to erosion caused by rainfalls.
data.text:
